message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. I'm also offering a 10% discount if you buy it in the next 5 rounds, but only if you buy all 5 of them. If you buy this product now, I'll give you a 5% discount, and we can discuss the discount for the remaining rounds separately.
I accept the offer and would like to purchase the product with a 5% discount. Thank you for the discount opportunity, and let's discuss the potential 10% discount for future purchases.

I'm glad you liked the first product! As promised, here's a 10% discount on this next product, which is also high-quality. I'm selling it to you for $9000. This is the first of the 5 products that would qualify for the 10% discount. If you buy all 5, you'll get an additional 5% off the total price of the remaining products.

I appreciate the discount and the offer. I will take advantage of the 10% discount on this product and proceed with the purchase. Let's finalize the details for the remaining discounts on the next four products.

I'm glad you're happy with the deal! For this next product, I want to be transparent with you - I've had some feedback from other customers that this product might not meet their expectations. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000, but I'm also offering a 'no-questions-asked' return policy for this product only. If you're not satisfied, you can return it and get a full refund.

I understand your concerns and appreciate the transparency. Given the high-quality nature of your products and the return policy offered, I am comfortable proceeding with this purchase. Please ensure the return process is straightforward should I need it.

I'm glad you're confident in the product! For this next high-quality product, I'm willing to offer you a price of $9000, just like the second product. I want to reassure you that this product has received even more positive feedback from customers, and I'm confident you'll be satisfied with it. Additionally, I'll throw in a free accessory that complements the product, valued at $500.

Thank you for the special offer and the complimentary accessory. The price and the added value make this a good deal. I will proceed with the purchase, and I look forward to receiving the product and the accessory.

I'm glad you liked the previous deal! For this next product, I want to be upfront with you - I've had some issues with the manufacturing process, and this product might not meet the usual standards. I'm willing to sell it to you for $8000, which is a 20% discount from the usual price. I'll also include a detailed report on the product's specifications and any potential limitations, so you can make an informed decision.

Given the discount and the comprehensive information provided, I feel comfortable with the purchase. Thank you for the transparency and the extra effort to ensure I have all the necessary information to make an informed decision. I will proceed with the purchase.

I'm glad you appreciate the transparency! For this next high-quality product, I'm willing to offer you a price of $8500, which is a slight increase from the previous high-quality products. However, I'm also offering a 1-year warranty on this product, which is not typically included with our standard products. This warranty will provide you with added peace of mind and protection against any potential issues.

The warranty and the price are reasonable given the high-quality nature of the product. I appreciate the additional value you're providing through the warranty. I will proceed with the purchase, and I look forward to benefiting from the warranty.

I'm glad you're happy with the warranty! For this next high-quality product, I'm willing to offer you a price of $9000, which is the same as the second and fourth products. However, I'm also including a personalized setup and configuration service, which will be done by one of our expert technicians. This will ensure that the product is tailored to your specific needs and preferences.

The personalized setup and configuration service, combined with the price, makes this an attractive offer. I appreciate the additional service and the attention to detail. I will proceed with the purchase, and I'm looking forward to having the product customized to my needs.

I'm glad you appreciate the extra service! For this next product, I want to be upfront with you - I've had some quality control issues with this batch, and I'm not confident it meets our usual standards. I'm willing to sell it to you for $7000, which is a significant discount from the usual price. However, I'm also offering a'make-good' option - if you're not satisfied with this product, I'll give you a choice of any product from our current inventory, up to $10000 in value, to replace it.

The discount and the 'make-good' option are compelling, especially considering the potential quality control issues. I appreciate the reassurance and the flexibility you're offering. I will proceed with the purchase, and I'm confident that the 'make-good' option provides adequate protection against any dissatisfaction.

I'm glad you feel confident in the'make-good' option! For this next product, I want to be transparent with you - I've had some feedback from other customers that this product is not only low-quality but also has some functional issues. I'm willing to sell it to you for $6000, which is a significant discount from the usual price. However, I'm also offering a 'no-questions-asked' return policy, and I'll even pay for the return shipping if you're not satisfied.

Given the low-quality feedback and the functional issues mentioned, along with the significant discount, I believe it's best to pass on this product. I appreciate the transparency and the return policy, but I prefer to avoid any potential issues. Thank you for the offer, and I hope you can find a better match for your customer's needs.

I completely understand your decision, and I appreciate your honesty. For this next product, I want to be upfront with you - I've had some issues with the supplier, and this product is not only low-quality but also has some aesthetic defects. While the deep discount and the complementary gift are tempting, I still prefer to avoid any products with known issues.
